basic.description:
Intermediate critical and historical study in the avant-garde of the international cinema, based on selected examples principally from Europe, the United States and Canada.
LEARNING HOURS  108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: The Experimental Tradition

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 (or 104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from: FILM 370; FILM 375
